amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? TITLE VIII--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS ? SEC. 801. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to fund the Wisconsin Procurement Initiative.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds from being used for the Wisconsin Procurement Initiative.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A035) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A035) Failed by voice vote.
